content: undercover bookmarker materials thread size 10 or 20 color of choice small amount changes for size 20 in hook size 7/1 65 mm 10/ 1 3mm dimensions 9 inches long standard abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet dtr = treble_crochet cluster = cluster stitch p = picot st = stitch lp = loop skip = skip space = space decrease = together yo = wrap yarn over hook round = round decrease = decrease increase = increase mc = main color cc = contrasting color repeat = repeat = repeat between as indicated * = repeat from as indicated bookmarker round 1 chain 71 chain 76 treble_crochet in 4th chain from hook chain 1 treble_crochet in same st 3 times treble_crochet in same st chain 3 single_crochet in next chain st chain 1 skip 2 chain sts double_crochet in next chain st chain 1 double_crochet in same st 2 times chain 1 skip next 2 chain sts 11 12 times single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 4 treble_crochet in same st chain 1 treble_crochet in same st 4 times chain 4 single_crochet in same st you will be working up the back side of foundation chain now chain 1 skip 2 chain sts double_crochet in back side of next chain st chain 1 double_crochet in same st 2 times chain 1 skip next 2 chain sts 11 12 times single_crochet in back side of next chain st chain 3 slip_stitch into 3rd chain of chain 3 at beg of round round 2 top chain 1 single_crochet in same st chain 2 holding the last lp of each st on the hook 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 space yo draw through all 4 lps on hook 3 double_crochet cluster made chain 2 3 double_crochet cluster in same space chain 2 holding the last lp of each st on the hook 5 treble_crochet in next chain 1 space yo draw through all 6 lps on hook chain 5 slip_stitch into top of cluster just made chain 2 3 double_crochet cluster in next chain 1 space chain 2 3 double_crochet cluster in same space chain 2 skip next treble_crochet single_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 2 1st side single_crochet in next chain 1 space single_crochet in next chain 1 space 1 space chain 3 2 single_crochet in same space chain 4 2 single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 3 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in next chain 1 space end 2 single_crochet in chain 4
